website_summaries.verdict: Specially formulated to relieve common skin ailments while staying gentle and hydrating.
pros: Convenient foaming spray makes it easy to use
Cleans and conditions while addressing issues such as fungus, rain rot, ringworm, and yeast
Contain no sulfates,  harsh chemical dyes, or parabens
cons: Small amount for the price, but it could be worth it if your horse has skin ailments

customer_reviews.title: Love how it rinses off.
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy this at my feed store..$10 cheaper on Amazon!. I love how it goes on easily and rinses off easily ..works great on fungi as well on dogs : )
customer_reviews.author: Alison Bybee

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I've tried almost everything to stop my horse from ruining my fencing & barn with the rubbing from itching and this is the only product that has reduced the problem. Horse still rubs a bit, but nothing like before. I have used it twice and will continue to use it throughout the spring & summer when itching reaches its peak. Container still feels heavy as if I haven't used any, so it should last for some time. Comes out foaming so all you have to do is work it into the wet coat & rinse; very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Used this to treat a skin fungus on my horse. Made him look good and smell wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Pennie F. Holiday

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, better then expected
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous product! Cleared up scruffy, scabby area on horse’s cannon bones. Black scruff had spread to parts of horse’s main, rump. Sprayed this on in a bath, lathered up, scrubbbed it in and saw immediate improvement with scruff eliminated after just 2-3 treatments. Love the fragrance, even got stubborn stains out of my gray horse. Very easy to apply from the foaming sprayer.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Santy

customer_reviews.title: Smells Awful
customer_reviews.text: Used on my horses’ mane and tail. Smells so bad can hardly stand to be near him. Used once, so far no sign that it is working. Was easy to apply, seemed to rinse well. Thank God I didn’t use it on his whole body. Missed the return window by one day—had to wait for warmer weather.
customer_reviews.author: marla

customer_reviews.title: Shiny coats
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful easy to use shampoo foam. Works well on rain rot and makes their coats shine.
customer_reviews.author: Mav's mom

customer_reviews.title: Throwing out my hose shampoo attachment!
customer_reviews.text: So much easier than trying to attach the foamer hose attachment to the barn horse. This spray shampoo works great & doesn’t irritate my sensitive mare!
customer_reviews.author: Lainey S

customer_reviews.title: Dandruff
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband to cure his dandruff, as I read some people have had success with this method. It works! It's non-irritating, and his hair is nice and shiny (bonus). Very satisfied with this product!
customer_reviews.author: K. Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Great shampoo for treatment of skin problems.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use spray on application and great foaming actions. Seems to give almost immediate relief for minor skin irratations
customer_reviews.author: richard s earle

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: A friend told me about this shampoo and I'm glad I tried it. Works great on my spooky Shetland pony. Spraying it on is very quiet and doesn't frighten him. It's much easier to use than liquid shampoos.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Works very well !!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this spray it works so well ! I’d recommend it a 💯!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this product but one of the bottles arrived broken it was a bit of a mess
customer_reviews.text: Love this product but one of the bottles arrived broken it was a bit of a mess
customer_reviews.author: Anne H

customer_reviews.title: I really like how it streamlines the cleaning process of the horse ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like how it streamlines the cleaning process of the horse after riding. There is no need for a bucket saving a step and time. This formula is mild enough for regular use.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Not effective to help rain rot heal
customer_reviews.text: This product did not help heal the rain rot at all
customer_reviews.author: Janell Harwell

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, effective foam shampoo
customer_reviews.text: Easy to direct the foam, good shampoo, especially useful on the hair of Shire horse legs😊
customer_reviews.author: Cruiser

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I have a 3yo with a chronic itch. I’ve tried supplements, lotions and other shampoos. None worked. After two weeks and four baths with Vetericyn Medicated, she’s itch free and the skin lesions are gone. Works great!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked well to just spray on and not rinse off.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Tenia Skinner

customer_reviews.title: Coat is beautiful and skin problem resolved
customer_reviews.text: Horses had skin problem, itching, coat thinning. Shampoo worked. I us it regularly now. Coat is beautiful and skin problem resolved.
customer_reviews.author: Gwynn D Keisler

customer_reviews.title: Foam wash
customer_reviews.text: Best foam wash. Really love it very easy to use and does not take a lot
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: This is NOT the antibacterial version.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the antibacterial version of this shampoo, but instead received the shine one. Not at all what I wanted, as my horse has some fungus on her back legs and I wanted something to help with that. The product does work well for a regular shampoo for her coat, but I had to buy something else for an antibacterial and anti fungal shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: BeTalvy

customer_reviews.title: Paraben free shampoo; here’s the ingredient list
customer_reviews.text: Vetericyn FoamCare Equine Shampoo is plant based, paraben free, and has no chemical dyes. It is formulated to be non-irritaing and is the right ph for equine skin. Easy to apply with the sprayer and easy to rinse. It also is lightly conditioning. Ingredients: Purified Water, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Lauramine Oxide, Panthenol, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizinate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Allantoin, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract, Tremella Fuciformis Sporocarp (Mushroom) Extract, Sodium Phytate, Cocamidopropyl PG-Dimonium Chloride, Iodopropynyl Butylcarbamate, Citric Acid
customer_reviews.author: It's Just Me

customer_reviews.title: Nice overall product
customer_reviews.text: This product should be a staple for anyone with horses or a horse. The spay mechanism is large, well made and makes it easy to spray over the back of the horse. After the horse is wet, spray the shampoo on making sure to apply to any dry, itchy affected areas. The foam comes out immediately, but is not super soapy. This makes is easy to rinse after the horse has be washed. This product is contained in a 32 oz bottle and has a nice scent. Whether you wash your horse regularly or give it the occasional clean up, this is shampoo product that does it all.
customer_reviews.author: G. Hearn

customer_reviews.title: Worked Well on a Burro
customer_reviews.text: I've used the Vetericyn wound care spray and it worked very well, so I hoped this would help a friend's burro. The burro does not have any chronic skin issues or parasites, but can occasionally get skin issues if she gets into the wrong feed or is fed 'treats' by well-meaning kids. It is extremely easy to use, the foam is wet enough to stay on while the entire body is covered. Work in, rinse off, it's that easy. Best of all, it doesn't leave her feeling dry, as I assumed a medicated product would.
customer_reviews.author: ShannonOnTheLakes

customer_reviews.title: Powerful yet gentle shampoo for equines
customer_reviews.text: The Vetericyn company makes a very effective first aid spray for animal use that has proven remarkably successful for oun assorted animals, so I had great expectations for the equine shampoo, both plain and medicated. We are not disappointed. It delivers aerated foamy, like Bath and Body Works foam soaps. Any soil on the horse gathers in the foam and rinses cleanly, leaving a shiny coat. The plain shampoo is virtually odorless, and the medicated version has a mild scent.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann

customer_reviews.title: Good all around
customer_reviews.text: Super convenient spray bottle with an easy to use, easy to tolerate equine shampoo. I had already tried the medicated version from this same company but if you don't need the medication for fungal/bacterial/other irritation then this is the one to go with. Summer in Florida means biting bugs, high heat and humidity so the medicated version is great...this is a good all around solution for the rest of the time. Easy to use trigger spray, decent lather and nice fragrance.
customer_reviews.author: AnAmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Gentle and Effective
customer_reviews.text: This vegetable based shampoo is effective and gentle. The trigger mechanism works well. the shampoo cleans and rinses off without leaving any residue or residual stickiness. It seems to sooth sensitive skin and leaves the coat fresh and shiny. It makes bathing a pleasant,less messy, stress free experience and seems to support the coat and skin.
customer_reviews.author: Antigone Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Convenient, and from a trustworthy brand.
customer_reviews.text: First, Vetericyn is a great brand and we make sure to always have their spray at the barn. This spray bottle is a very convenient for washing horses. I haven't had to use it yet (thankfully). My daughter's horse had some bad reactions to bug bites this past summer, and I wish we had had some of this then. It's probably another product from them that will be a staple at the barn.
customer_reviews.author: medieval mama

customer_reviews.title: Produces clean and shiny equine coat
customer_reviews.text: This delivers as foam and thoroughly cleans, rinsing away with minimal water. There is practically no scent. A little goes a long way, which is to the good.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann

customer_reviews.title: This is a really great equine shampoo
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great equine shampoo. We use it on our horses as well as a few other products by this brand & they have all been fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel  Taylor

product_meta.title: Vetericyn FoamCare Equine Medicated Shampoo
product_meta.description: Style:Shampoo + Shine[Made in USA] Vetericyn FoamCare Medicated Equine Shampoo is specially formulated to alleviate and manage skin ailments common to horses. This medicated shampoo aids in relieving itchy, dry, scaling and irritated skin as well as treating fungal skin disorders, rain rot, ring worm and yeast. With its innovative foaming spray applicator, FoamCare is applied evenly with less mess—simply from the squeeze of a trigger. Vetericyn FoamCare supports optimal skin and coat health and is soothing, pH optimized and retains the essential oils in your horse's skin. It is the new easy on, easy off shampoo that makes bathing your horse more fun with less stress.
feature_bullets: Provides healing relief for fungal disorders such as rain rot, ring worm, yeast and more
Made with Ketoconazole (1%) to help manage itchy, dry, scaling, and irritated skin while providing and retaining essential oils necessary for optimal skin and coat health
Delivers nutrients to horse's skin while providing a conditioning clean to their coat and helping prevent skin issues
Unique spray foam shampoo sprays on exactly where you want, doesn't drip off so product doesn't get wasted, and rinses off easily without leaving behind residue
Better ingredients for a healthier clean - no sulfates, no harsh chemical dyes and paraben free - safe for everyday use
Easy to use spray applicator helps get shampoo to those hard-to-reach spots on the horse
